content: make your own cat blanket to keep your fur baby cozy and protect your furniture from fur an easy project that works up fast great for beginners this blanket is sized for a cat or small dog to lay on and fit atop most couch cushions but the pattern is quite versatile with a 3 round repeat similar to a continuous granny square plus an easy border so feel free to size up or down by adding or subtracting rounds to get the size you want would work well for a lap blanket throw granny square pillow cover etc worked in the round as a flat square the pdf pattern includes all the details you need with materials list clear instructions photos of each step written pattern pattern chart and there is a follow along youtube video available as well linked in pattern skill level easy/beginner us terminology recommended yarn made with love the cottony one by lion brand or any similar medium weight yarn category 4/worsted measures just shy of 20 square pattern © 2023 courtney mcfarland you may sell finished products using this pattern please do not copy or resell the pattern itself feel free to contact me with any questions i love creating crochet patterns so i will be adding more soon follow me here instagram 1 youtube 2 1 https //www instagram com/patternandcraft/ 2 https //www youtube com/channel/uclewaj6zkjkgsbttmc90qsg
